00040 #ifndef PMEMOBJ_MAKE_PERSISTENT_ATOMIC_HPP
00041 #define PMEMOBJ_MAKE_PERSISTENT_ATOMIC_HPP
00042 
00043 #include "libpmemobj++/detail/check_persistent_ptr_array.hpp"
00044 #include "libpmemobj++/detail/common.hpp"
00045 #include "libpmemobj++/detail/make_atomic_impl.hpp"
00046 #include "libpmemobj++/detail/pexceptions.hpp"
00047 #include "libpmemobj++/pool.hpp"
00048 #include "libpmemobj/atomic_base.h"
00049 
00050 #include <tuple>
00051 
00052 namespace nvml
00053 {
00054 
00055 namespace obj
00056 {
00057 
00073 template <typename T, typename... Args>
00074 void
00075 make_persistent_atomic(pool_base &pool,
00076                        typename detail::pp_if_not_array<T>::type &ptr,
00077                        Args &&... args)
00078 {
00079         auto arg_pack = std::make_tuple(args...);
00080         auto ret = pmemobj_alloc(pool.get_handle(), ptr.raw_ptr(), sizeof(T),
00081                                  detail::type_num<T>(),
00082                                  &detail::obj_constructor<T, Args...>,
00083                                  static_cast<void *>(&arg_pack));
00084 
00085         if (ret != 0)
00086                 throw std::bad_alloc();
00087 }
00088 
00099 template <typename T>
00100 void
00101 delete_persistent_atomic(
00102         typename detail::pp_if_not_array<T>::type &ptr) noexcept
00103 {
00104         if (ptr == nullptr)
00105                 return;
00106 
00107         /* we CAN'T call the destructor */
00108         pmemobj_free(ptr.raw_ptr());
00109 }
00110 
00111 } /* namespace obj */
00112 
00113 } /* namespace nvml */
00114 
00115 #endif /* PMEMOBJ_MAKE_PERSISTENT_ATOMIC_HPP */
